description:
Chronograph is an easy to use and highly effective stopwatch application.  Keep track of as many laps as you want using the built in split timer.  Chronograph is great for the runner as the timer is accurate whether running in the foreground or in the background with other more intensive applications running over top of it.  So set the timer start your music and go for a jog and enjoy.
Also included is a "kitchen" timer.  Set the amount of hours minutes and seconds until you want to be alerted and Chronograph will alert you at that time.
